snippet: Two companies plan to use novel solar storage technology to power households on summer nights.
abstract: California companies SolarReserve and BrightSource are planning to deploy a new form of solar storage technology to power tens of thousands of households; they will use solar thermal power to store energy for use when sun is not shining; crucial role of their plants will be complementing solar panels.
lead_paragraph: Two companies plan to use novel solar storage technology to power households on summer nights.

headline.seo: Building Storehouses for the Sun’s Energy, for Use After Dark
headline.main: Storehouses for Solar Energy Can Step In When the Sun Goes Down
